Music Photography

Photographing live music usually means battling with constantly-changing lighting, but it also leads to great rushes of adrenaline while I shoot a show. This is especially true when it involves taking photos of some of my favourite artists, including Lady Gaga, Rihanna and Katy Perry. View more of my live music photography on my Flickr.

Want to have a chat or say hello? Send me an email
